#include <boost/regex.hpp>
    #include <iostream>
    #include <string>
    
    int main()
    {
    	std::string line;
    	boost::regex pat(""^Subject: (Re: |Aw: )*(.*)"");
    
    	while (std::cin)
    	{
    		std::getline(std::cin, line);
    		boost::smatch matches;
    		if (boost::regex_match(line, matches, pat))
    			std::cout << matches[2] << std::endl;
    	}
    }
